derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent.: from French, from Dutch korf, denoting a kind of ship, + the diminutive suffix -ette

entry.def: A corvette is a small fast warship that is used to protect other ships from attack.

means.word_mean: 1. a highly maneuverable escort warship; smaller than a destroyer
